Author: lotsofsqs
Text: It will interrupt your symptoms and get you eating on a regular schedule with regular amounts. You won't be able to engage in your over eating or purging.   Like u/tzt-t mentioned, the AN fear foods (burgers, fries) may be close to your trigger foods, so that could be a good way of practicing eating a normal amount of those.  It may not cure you permanently, but it's a good first step.

Author: tzt-t
Text: never been due to dietary restrictions but toured a unit. tbh it seemed tailored to anorexics and EDs in that realm. it was a very "reach a BMI of 20 and consume these fear foods (ie. burgers, fries, hot dogs etc) every day until you get there and then you're cured" kind of mentality. I've not seen much at all in the way of disorders on the bingeing side of the spectrum.
